attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's disgusting how the government don't do more about this problem. Continued under investment in this area directly led to the earthquake of 27th February 2008 and such an event can no longer be brushed aside by this government.
THIS IS A PROBLEM ON THE SCALE OF CLIMATE CHANGE (and obesity???)!!!! We call for £100 Billion investment in earthquake warning systems and the opening of a Earthquake Action Centre to  prevent future Earthquake events.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
